reviews.review_msg: Do not take this course if you have other classes that are homework heavy. Wynnie was nice and organized, but there were at least one or two participation assignments every week on top of other things. The grading is quite strict with no wiggle room. The standards for the final project are a little unreasonable. This was a very stressful class.

Gpa booster? I would say it depends because for sure you do well then you get good grade, but for me is just too tiring. HEAVY WORKLOAD - at least 2 assignments/week, and they all cant be done in just 1 day. Dont recommend taking online because group project is a matter for real! Slides are simple and prof is just fine. Yes midterm, no final
Too much homework that take too much time for how much they are worth, unclear grading requirements. Lecture was just short videos posted on canvas. Overall didn't learn much from her class.
